extDescription.message: Your personal language learning assistant to help you practice and improve.

onboardingISpeak.description: Label before the native language selector in onboarding.

onboardingIWantToLearn.description: Label indicating the target language selection section.

onboardingSelectLanguage.description: Placeholder text for the native language dropdown.

onboardingLearningGoalQuestionPrefix.description: The first part of the question asking for learning motivation.

onboardingLearningGoalQuestionSuffix.description: The punctuation mark at the end of the learning motivation question.

onboardingTargetLanguageFallback.description: Fallback text if the target language label isn't available.

onboardingContinue.description: Text for the button to proceed to the next onboarding step.

extensionDescription.message: Your comprehensive language learning and productivity assistant, designed to make your browsing experience more immersive and efficient.

onboardingSetupLLMDescription.message: Can't run a 4B+ model locally like Qwen3, Gemma3, or Deepseek? Use Jan with an OpenRouter model, many are free!

onboardingSetupEmbeddingDescription.message: Bge-m3 or bge-large are best due to multi-language support.

onboardingRedirectsDescription.message: Use privacy-preserving frontends with many mirrors.

onboardingErrorTestFailedNoAudio.message: Test failed: No audio data received from ElevenLabs.

onboardingErrorUnknownTestError.message: An unknown error occurred during the ElevenLabs test.

newTabPageMoodPrompt.description: Prompt for the daily mood selector on the new tab page.

newTabPageButtonStartFocus.description: Button text to activate focus mode.

newTabPageButtonStopFocus.description: Button text to deactivate focus mode.

onboardingSetupVADDescription.message: Test your microphone and speech to text conversion.

onboardingVADNoApiKeyForSTT.message: ElevenLabs API key not provided in TTS step; transcription will be disabled.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryDescription.message: Privately, I will analyse your browser history to better understand you!

deckSelectionPanelDescription.message: Like Anki web, you can create, use, and share our community's flashcards.

deckSelectionPanelNoDecks.message: No recommended decks available for this learning goal.

onboardingElevenLabsTestText.message: Hello from Scarlett! This is an onboarding test.

onboardingEmbeddingPersonalityMessage.message: Embedding Scarlett's personality... This might take a minute

onboardingVADErrorNoAudio.message: No audio has been recorded to transcribe.

onboardingVADErrorElevenLabsNotSet.message: ElevenLabs API key is not set. Please configure it in the TTS step.

onboardingVADErrorMediaDevices.message: MediaDevices API or getUserMedia not supported.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryPermissionDenie.message: Unable to analyze browsing history - permission was not granted. You can continue without this step.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryNoHistory.message: We couldn't find much browsing history to analyze. This is normal if you're using a new browser or have recently cleared your history.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryAnalysisFailedM.message: Unable to analyze browsing history. You can continue with the setup.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryNoHistoryFallba.message: We couldn't analyze your browsing history. This might be because you have limited history or use private browsing.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryProductiveFocus.message: You seem to focus on productive activities online! You visit {count} work-related sites regularly.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryBalancedHabits.message: You have a good balance of work and entertainment in your browsing habits.

onboardingBrowsingHistoryModerateUsage.message: Your browsing patterns suggest moderate internet usage across {count} different sites.

modelSelectionSelectModel.description: Placeholder text for model selection dropdown.

modelSelectionSearchDownloadableLLMs.description: Placeholder text for searching remote/downloadable LLM models.

modelSelectionLocalLabel.description: Label prefix for local model selection section.

modelSelectionRemoteLLMLabel.description: Label for remote LLM model selection section.

modelSelectionSelectRemoteLLMAriaLabel.description: Aria label for remote LLM selection.

connectionTestConnecting.description: Status message shown while testing connection.

connectionTestSuccess.description: Status message shown when connection test succeeds.

connectionTestPlayTestAudio.description: Button text to play test audio after successful TTS test.

connectionTestError403.message: Error: Connection failed (403 Forbidden). Check API key or CORS.

connectionTestErrorGeneric.description: Generic error message prefix for connection test failures.

connectionTestCorsGenericHelp.message: Ensure CORS is enabled on your server.

ttsProviderLabel.description: Label for TTS provider selection section.

ttsApiKeyLabel.description: Label for API key input field.

ttsElevenLabsApiKeyPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for ElevenLabs API key input field.

ttsTesting.description: Button text shown while testing TTS connection.

ttsTestConnection.description: Button text to test TTS connection.

ttsPlayTestAudio.description: Button text to play test audio after successful TTS test.

vadSpeechToTextLabel.description: Label for the speech to text section in VAD panel.

vadInitializing.description: Button text shown while VAD is initializing.

vadTranscribing.description: Button text shown while transcribing audio.

vadListening.description: Button text shown while VAD is listening for speech.

vadTest.description: Button text to start VAD test.

newTabPageButtonChat.description: Button text to navigate to the chat page from new tab.

chatPageSpeechMode.description: Label for the speech mode toggle switch in chat page header.

chatPageGenerateRoleplay.description: Button text to generate a new roleplay scenario.

chatPageInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the chat input field.

chatPageStartVoiceChat.description: Button text to start voice conversation in speech mode.

chatPageStopVoiceChat.description: Button text to stop voice conversation in speech mode.

chatPageListening.description: Status text shown when the app is listening for voice input.

chatPageResponding.description: Status text shown when the AI is generating a voice response.

chatPageLoadingOlderMessages.description: Text shown when loading older chat messages.

chatPageNoMessagesYet.description: Text shown when there are no chat messages in the conversation.

bookmarksPageNoBookmarksYet.description: Text shown when user has no bookmarks saved.

settingsPageLoadingSettings.description: Text shown while settings are being loaded.

settingsPageErrorLoadingSettings.description: Text shown when there's an error loading settings.

settingsPageSelectCategory.message: Select a category from the sidebar to configure.
settingsPageSelectCategory.description: Instruction text shown when no settings category is selected.

settingsPageSectionModels.description: Label for the models section in settings sidebar.

settingsPageSectionCensorship.description: Label for the censorship section in settings sidebar.

settingsPageSectionProductivity.description: Label for the productivity section in settings sidebar.

settingsPageMenuLLM.description: Menu item text for LLM settings.

settingsPageMenuTTS.description: Menu item text for TTS settings.

settingsPageMenuSTTVAD.description: Menu item text for Speech-to-Text and Voice Activity Detection settings.

settingsPageMenuRedirects.description: Menu item text for redirects settings.

settingsPageMenuFocusMode.description: Menu item text for focus mode settings.

settingsPageVADSectionTitle.message: Speech to Text & Voice Activity Detection
settingsPageVADSectionTitle.description: Title for the VAD settings section.
